title: CodeAid MVP Copilot
description: AI-powered platform that guides early-stage founders through the critical journey from initial concept to viable MVP. It's like having an experienced co-founder who's available 24/7 to help validate ideas through structured frameworks and market analysis, generate comprehensive user personas and surveys, define go-to-market strategy, define MVP scope with feature prioritization, get tech stack recommendations. Ever had a startup idea you needed clarity on? Try using CodeAid MVP Copilot today.
